website_summaries.verdict: If you like the looks of Fila shoes, but are put off by the bright colors of some of the styles, go with this shoe.
pros: Lightweight, comfortable and colors are more subdued than other styles
Synthetic mesh uppers with padded collar
cons: Hard to find the right size

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am on the fence with these shoes. As far as looks they are beautiful and i love the colors. Padding and support is lacking especially for a running/walking shoe. I expected more cushion and comfort. But for this price you cant expect too much. Overall, I am happy with purchase and would buy again based on the looks of the shoe alone. They also do not squish my toes like new balance and nike tend to. They have a bit wider toe area so they are more comfortable. Just need a good insert if you need better arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moses

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always wear Fila shoes so I expected this pair to fit - and they do. These shoes are a perfect price and are very good quality. Two Prime shipping makes it even better!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes because I needed comfortable supportive shoes that I could place my orthodontics in to wear in the house all day. Very comfortable and I have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.Walker

customer_reviews.title: LEFT AND RIGHT SHOE SIZE DIFFERENT
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable and DIDN'T REALIZE until I looked in my shoe and saw the left tag size 7 and the right tag size 6 1/2!!!! What the heck! And it's too late for a refund!!! So upset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: These have become my everyday shoes. They are comfortable during my morning jog, all day running errands and my feet still feel good at night when I slip them off :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: these shoes fit and feel great. Breathable and comfy running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, these shoes fit and feel great. Breathable and comfy running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiana

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of athletic shoes but I need to put ...
customer_reviews.text: A great pair of athletic shoes but I need to put in more cushioning.... it could just be my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Barton-Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They fit as expected and are very comfortable. I love the pop of color. They dry quickly if you happen to get them wet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, thank goodness. I use them as work shoes, and they are holding up very well. Not slip-resistant, however. They are just as vibrant in real life as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Crys Marsters-Skerry

customer_reviews.title: Oaky for walking the dog
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers mentioned that the bottom platform seems thin. I added a Dr. Scholl's padded insole into each, which solved the problem. ( I also had ordered a half size larger).
customer_reviews.author: Roseann R.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Fila Feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of Filas I've purchased for work. They're great! (I work in a hospital pharmacy & am on my feet for 10 hrs.)
customer_reviews.author: Kayjack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with them, happy with the price and no issues with the delivery/shipping.
customer_reviews.author: szpear

customer_reviews.title: Quality Aerodynamic Running Shoes On A Budget
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shoes. They feel good on and look very nice. Make great walking or running shoes. Very cushioned sole. Nice laces. Great breathable exterior. The fit is okay. A little bit looser than I would have wanted but nothing that can't be fixed with a bigger sock. I have feet that swell so getting my size right with swelling is impossible sometimes. Love the way the shoe is made to be almost aerodynamic. It's Fila and Fila is a good brand. Great budget work out shoe. Would recommend, and the size calculator on this item is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Missy K.

customer_reviews.title: They look cute
customer_reviews.text: They look cute, walk fine. They could be more comfortable over the day.
customer_reviews.author: C. Family

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best arch support, but it's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, I can't wait to purchase another pair of Fila.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa C.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great looking. They've gotten a lot of use
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great looking. They've gotten a lot of use, and look great. My only problem is the way I walk, pokes a hole in the mess part.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: ... wear thicker socks after breaking them in they feel wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: they got about half size big I just wear thicker socks after breaking them in they feel wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: wendy huber

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I am a waitress I wear these shoes all night at work. They are great and I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: jocelyncie

customer_reviews.title: FILA fits the budget
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and super light! Great value compared to same type shoe from Nike or adidas. I love adidas but FILA fits my budget! Three members of my family are now FILA converts. My son only wants Memory Foam shoes now!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: ... hollow in regards to support but very stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits as sized a little hollow in regards to support but very stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Connie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Fila shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe nice and comfy and the colors are great together. got them for an awesome price too
customer_reviews.author: Becks84

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit big, no support at all. No impact support. Q
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I needed shoes crazy bad and these were the perfect price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fila Women's Stir Up Running Shoe
product_meta.description: This fila running shoe combines technical features and great styling. It provides cushioning, stability and absorbs road shock. Looks great with athletic and fashion apparel.
